name: bumsonseats
description: D3 visualization website for performance data

scripts.dev: panda codegen --config config/panda.config.mjs && panda cssgen --config config/panda.config.mjs --outfile styled-system/styles.css --watch & vite --config config/vite.config.js --host
scripts.dev:local: panda codegen --config config/panda.config.mjs && panda cssgen --config config/panda.config.mjs --outfile styled-system/styles.css --watch & vite --config config/vite.config.js
scripts.build: panda codegen --config config/panda.config.mjs && panda cssgen --config config/panda.config.mjs --outfile styled-system/styles.css && vite build --config config/vite.config.js
